data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 1, Joao Mario of Sporting gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Guimaraes are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick Sporting.
In the minute 3, At Dom Afonso Henriques, Mikel Agu has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Guimaraes needs to be cautious. Sporting have an attacking throw-in.
Sporting are coming forward and Andraz Sporar gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In Guimaraes, Pedro Goncalves of Sporting is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Sporting just outside Guimaraes's area.
In the minute 10, Sporting push forward at Dom Afonso Henriques and Sebastian Coates gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Guimaraes defence.
Corner awarded to Sporting.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 11, Nuno Santos puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Pedro Goncalves instrumental with a fine assist.
Guimaraes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Guimaraes in Guimaraes.
Guimaraes have a dangerous throw-in.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 14, Guimaraes are in shooting range from this free kick.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Throw-in for Sporting at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Sporting.
In the minute 18, Sporting's Zouhair Feddal misses with an attempt on goal.
Hugo Miguel awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Ricardo Quaresma for Guimaraes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
Gideon Mensah for Guimaraes is back on the field again.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gideon Mensah.
In the minute 21, At Dom Afonso Henriques, Sporting are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Sporting.
Easah Suliman (Guimaraes) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Mikel Agu for Guimaraes who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 24, Ball safe as Sporting is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It seems as if Mikel Agu is unable to continue. Pepelu replaces him for the home team.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
Throw-in for Sporting in the half of Guimaraes.
In the minute 26, Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ricardo Quaresma of Guimaraes is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 28, Guimaraes's Marcus Edwards gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Sporting at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
In the minute 30, Hugo Miguel awards the home team a throw-in.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
In the minute 31, Hugo Miguel signals a Sporting throw-in in Guimaraes's half.
Guimaraes have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Sporting at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 32, Throw-in for Sporting in their own half.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 33, Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 35, Guimaraes drive upfield and Pepelu gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sporting defender.
Guimaraes's Denis Poha breaks free at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
In the minute 37, Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
Guimaraes have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Sporting in their own half.
Andre Andre (Guimaraes) has received a yellow card from Hugo Miguel.
Sporting's Pedro Porro has been booked in Guimaraes.
In the minute 40, In Guimaraes Guimaraes attack through Ricardo Quaresma. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guimaraes.
Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Sporting.
In the minute 42, In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Easah Suliman (Guimaraes) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Sporting extend their lead to 0-2 through Pedro Goncalves.
In the minute 43, Great play from Pedro Porro to set up the goal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Sporting at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Free kick Guimaraes.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Sporting at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Hugo Miguel signals a throw-in for Sporting, close to Guimaraes's area.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, Hugo Miguel has blown to start the second-half.
Hugo Miguel signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Sporting's half.
Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
In the minute 47, Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
Guimaraes's Andre Andre is whistled for offside at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 52, Free kick in a good position for Guimaraes!
Hugo Miguel awards Sporting a goal kick.
Guimaraes to take a throw-in in Sporting territory.
In the minute 55, In Guimaraes, Guimaraes push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Goal! Sporting extend their lead to 0-3 through Pedro Goncalves.
Antonio Adan with an assist there.
In the minute 58, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
Matheus Nunes is on a sub for Joao Mario for Sporting.
Guimaraes are pushing forward but Ricardo Quaresma's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Sporting goal kick.
Corner awarded to Guimaraes.
Free kick for Guimaraes in the half of Sporting.
In the minute 62, Sporting's Nuno Santos gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Guimaraes defender.
Sporting have been awarded a corner by Hugo Miguel.
Sebastian Coates (Sporting) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 62, Hugo Miguel awards Guimaraes a goal kick.
Ball safe as Guimaraes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Guimaraes in their own half.
In Guimaraes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Guimaraes's Ricardo Quaresma gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 66, Sporting have a goal kick.
Tiago Tomas is replacing Andraz Sporar for the away team.
The away team replace Nuno Santos with Jovane Cabral.
In the minute 67, Hugo Miguel awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Guimaraes.
Rochinha is replacing Denis Poha for Guimaraes at Dom Afonso Henriques.
In the minute 68, Joao Henriques is making the team's third substitution at Dom Afonso Henriques with Miguel Luis replacing Marcus Edwards.
Goal kick for Sporting at Dom Afonso Henriques.
Sporting's Nuno Mendes breaks free at Dom Afonso Henriques. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 70, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guimaraes.
Bruno Duarte of Guimaraes smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Important block from the Sporting defence as Andre Andre fires in a strike for Guimaraes.
In the minute 74, Sporting's Tiago Tomas is on target but unsuccessful.
Jovane Cabral puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-4.
That's a fine assist from Matheus Nunes.
In the minute 75, Guimaraes make their fourth substitution with Lyle Foster replacing Bruno Duarte.
Guimaraes make their fifth substitution with Andre Almeida replacing Andre Andre.
Throw-in for Guimaraes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 77, Ricardo Quaresma for Guimaraes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Hugo Miguel awards Sporting a goal kick.
Jovane Cabral for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 78, Sporting drives forward and Pedro Goncalves gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in the half of Sporting.
Sporting awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, The away team have replaced Pedro Porro with Gonzalo Plata. This is the fourth substitution made today by Emanuel Ferro.
Daniel Braganca is replacing Pedro Goncalves for the away team.
Sporting awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 81, Important block from the Sporting defence as Ricardo Quaresma fires in a strike for Guimaraes.
Andre Almeida (Guimaraes) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
Hugo Miguel signals a Guimaraes throw-in in Sporting's half.
Throw-in for Guimaraes in their own half.
In the minute 86, Can Guimaraes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sporting's half?
Free kick Sporting.
Guimaraes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Hugo Miguel signals a free kick to Sporting.
Sporting's Jovane Cabral attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Guimaraes goal kick.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Free kick Guimaraes.
That's full-time at Dom Afonso Henriques. The final score is 0-4.
